channel.title: Zareus RSPS 317 |Customs| |Dicing| |Easy leveling| |Join and see our features|
channel.description:
[center] Welcome to Zareus
If you are looking at this page, you may be asking yourself.. What makes Zareus different from all the other 317 servers?
[b]- Dedicated Staff team & Developers. - Comfortable Exp rates - Decent drop rates - Amazing economy - Always people online - Awesome dice zone - 24/7 Dedicated host - DAILY UPDATES WITH NEW CONTENT! - Great donation benefits - All Skills trainable! - CUSTOMS - Skills, Slayer tasks, Quests, dominion tower. - Easy to navigate home - Community is amazing, extremely helpful to new players[/b]
[i][b]~~[ Bossing ]~~ [/b][/i] [b]- Bandos - Saradomin - Zamorak - Tormented Demons - Balance Elemental - Corporeal Beast - Giant Mole - Bork - Slayer Tower - Dagganoth Kings - King Black Dragon - Ice Strykewyrms - Desert Strykewyrms - Jungle Strykewyrms - WildyWyrm - Frost Dragons - Green Dragons - BarrelChest - Nomad[/b]
[i][b]~~[ Agility Courses ]~~[/b][/i]
[b]- Advanced Gnome Agility - Advanced Barbarian Agility[/b]
[i][b]~~[ Minigames ]~~ [/b][/i] [b]- Dominion Tower - Duel Arena - Barrows - Pest Control - Fight Pits - Fight Caves [/b]
Thank you for reading. We hope you consider us.
Pictures of some customs.
Royal Dhide- [url=http://prntscr.com/3uaaoj]http://prntscr.com/3uaaoj[/url]
Dragonbone Mage- [url=http://prntscr.com/3uab2r]http://prntscr.com/3uab2r[/url]
Dragonbone Melee- [url=http://prntscr.com/3uab81]http://prntscr.com/3uab81[/url]
Client- Being fixed... Adding more features and more. Webclient- [url=http://www.rswebclients.com/client/zareus]www.rswebclients.com/client/zareus[/url] [/center]
